page.title: 07 SHOPPING IN EXNING TODAY.
page.content: We made a survey on the aspects of shopping on two estates, Scaltback and Studlands, both with a parade of shops mostly covering daily needs like groceries,meat and newspapers. We also surveyed the village shop.We asked the customers questions like 'Why do you shop here?'.'What have you bought.' Most people bought food. The shops were used mainly because they were near to the customers home, although one woman came all the way from Barton Mills near Mildenhall to use one particular shop on the Scaltback estate. Scaltback did the most business being on the largest estate followed closely by Studlands. Exning did not do much business because it was only a village shop.
